availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

creation.placeName: San Francisco, San Francisco County, California

body.p:
State of California
County of San Francisco } SS.

I James R Garniss duly appointed by the Governor to the State of Kentucky, a Commissioner of the State of Kentucky, resident at San Francisco in the State of California. Do solemnly swear that I will well and faithfully execute and perform all the duties of such Commissioner under and by virtue of the laws of the State of Kentucky

Sworn and Subscribed before me this 6th October AD 1865
O. C. Beard
Judge 12th Dist. Court.

Impression of Official seal
Official signautre
James R Garniss

Comr Deeds
California
James R Garniss
Commissioner of Deeds for State of Kentucky
Oath of Office
filed 3d Nov/65
